message: Coming up on Periscope in 1/2 hour. Don’t miss Author Kelley Alsobrook and other awesome #PeriGirls talking about human trafficking.

data.description:
🎉 🎉  WOOOOO HOOOOO! Here is our final line up for Thursday, January 11th, 2018 Pass The Cast!

Join us at 👉  5PM PST to meet some amazing ladies from our PeriGirls Sisterhood and watch them ROCK it out!

You do not want to miss this very important topic of Human Trafficking Awareness

Be sure to be following the @PeriGirls handle on the Periscope app and have your notifications turned on so you get all the invites and will know where we are at!
